Learn Backend

The Great Backend Engineer (GBE) Podcast.

Tune in to learn how to become a great backend engineer from the experiences of other great backend engineers.

Solomon Eseme, the founder of Masteringbackend.com interviews great backend engineers to get insights into various backend engineering concepts and career tips for new backend engineers.
